[A Fighting Chance].abilityText:
If you are Daniel Taylor, you must add this card to any skirmish army you play.

At the start of the game, each figure in your army becomes Stunned.

[A New Hope].abilityText:
Include this card in your army only if each group in your army has one of the following names or sub-names:
- "Hero of the Rebellion"
- "C-3PO'
- "Chewbacca"
- "Han Solo"
- "Leia Organa"
- "Obi-Wan Kenobi"
- "R2-D2"

--------------------------
Deplete this card to have a friendly figure play a Command card with a restriction matching the name of another Deployment card in your army.

[Advanced Com Systems].abilityText:
LEADER ONLY

Abilities on your Deployment card that choose or affect adjacent friendly figures or friendly figures within 2 spaces can choose or affect other friendly figures within 3 spaces instead.

[Balance of the Force].abilityText: You may include an additional 3 points worth of Command cards in your deck.

[Beast Tamer].abilityText:
Exhaust this card at the start of a CREATURE's activation for that figure to perform a move.

Exhaust this card at the start of a figure's activation if that figure has the "NON-SENTIENT" trait. During this activation, that figure can interact.

[Black Market].abilityText:
At the end of each round, a friendly SMUGGLER may suffer 1 Strain. If it does, reveal the top Command card of your deck. Then, you may choose one of the following: 
- Spend VPs equal to the card's cost to draw it
- Discard that card and gain VPs equal to it's cost
- Return that card to the top of your deck

[Channel the Force].abilityText: Exhaust this card when you would draw 1 or more Command cards. Draw 1 fewer card than you would have. Then, search your Command deck for a card with the FORCE USER trait, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Then, shuffle your Command deck. Then, choose a friendly FORCE USER. That figure suffers Strain equal to the cost of the revealed card.

[Clan of Two].abilityText:
At the start of the mission, place The Child companion in your space or an adjacent space. The Child activates at the start or end of your activation. At the end of your activation, push the Child figure or its incapacitated token to your space or an adjacent space. While incapacitated, The Child is not counted for the purposes of control.

The Child cannot suffer Damage unless it is being attacked.

While you are defeated, a UNIQUE figure may retrieve The Child or its incapacitated token to gain 1 VP.

[Combat Suit].abilityText: While you are defending, reduce the Piece value of the attack results by 1, to a minimum of 0.

[Cross Training].abilityText: This group gains the SPY trait. When an attack targeting you is declared, you may replace 1 die in your defense pool with a white die.

[Devious Scheme].abilityText:
After setup, choose your Deployment zone. Your opponent starts the game with initiative and must deploy their figures first.

If your opponent also has "Devious Scheme", this card has no effect.

[Doubt].abilityText:
At the end of the round, you may choose a hostile figure and discard 1 condition or Power Token from that figure. 

Deplete this card while a hostile figure is attacking to choose 1 attack die. Your opponent must reroll that die.

[Driven by Hatred].abilityText:
DARTH VADER (LORD OF THE SITH) ONLY

Passive bonus: +1 Hit

You lose "Brutality." While attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.

At the end of each round, move up to 2 spaces. Then you may use "Force Choke" or perform an attack. When you declare this attack, remove 1 die from your attack pool.

[Explosive Armaments].abilityText:
Each figure in this group gains:

Double surge: +1 Hit, Blast 2

[Extra Armor].abilityText: After deployment, distribute 4 Block Tokens among friendly figures.

[Feeding Frenzy].abilityText:
CREATURE ONLY

Exhaust this card while attacking a figure that has suffered damage to apply +1 Hit to the attack results.

While attacking an adjacent figure, you gain: 
- Surge: Recover 2 Damage

[First Strike].abilityText: After setup, you and your opponent both receive 4 VPs
